summary: A French photograher is kidnapped and held hostage in a war-torn Beirut. Slowly but surely his integrity and self-respect is broken.
cast: Hippolyte Girardot|Rafik Ali Ahmad|Hussein Sbeity|Habib Hammoud|Majdi Machmouchi|Hassan Farhat|Hassan Zbib|Nabila Zeitouni|Hamza Nasrallah|Sami Hawat|Sabrina Leurquin|Roger Assaf|Nidal Al-Askhar|Fadi Abou Khalil|Ninar Esber|Maher Kassar|Phillipe Moyssan|Paul Mattar|Naji Assy|Ali Ballout|Frédéric Legris|Tarek Fayed
title: Hors la vie
